recipe.name: Two-minute smoothie
recipe.info: Whizz up a low fat breakfast smoothie in no time. Use banana with other soft fruit, plus honey for a little sweetness and oats for slow-release fuel

recipe.name: Flambéed chicken with asparagus
recipe.info: An elegant spring dinner party dish that looks and tastes very special. Perfect with new potatoes

recipe.name: Greek feta traybake
recipe.info: Make this Greek-inspired traybake with feta, olives, pitta bread and tomatoes for an easy midweek meal, then use the leftovers for lunch the next day

recipe.name: Blueberry bakewell muffins
recipe.info: These easy blueberry muffins have a delightfully jammy centre and crunchy crumble topping – a tasty treat for teatime or packed lunch

recipe.name: Sweet potato and coconut soup
recipe.info: Blitz up this simple vegan soup in just 20 minutes for a quick lunch or starter. Sweet potatoes, coconut and Thai green curry paste make for a flavourful combination, best enjoyed with warm naan bread

recipe.name: Little lemon meringue pies
recipe.info: These weeekend puds are light and fluffy with a tangy filling

recipe.name: Banana smoothie
recipe.info: Quick and easy to make, this banana, prune, almond milk and nut butter smoothie is an ideal on-the-go energy boost

recipe.name: Roast fillet of beef with mushroom stuffing
recipe.info: Serve up a spectacular centrepiece of roast beef with a rich stuffing, and a clever twist on Yorkshire puddings

recipe.name: Long amaretto sours
recipe.info: Add some glamour to an al fresco lunch by serving these cocktails to start

recipe.name: Blackened roast salmon with avocado & mango salsa
recipe.info: Use punchy Cajun spices to flavour this salmon dish. The fresh avocado and mango salsa and the zingy lime juice cuts through the spicy flavours of the salmon

recipe.name: burrito
recipe.info: Fill a nutritious wholemeal wrap with lots of healthy breakfast ingredients to make this veggie burrito. We’ve included protein-rich eggs and avocado to add good fats

recipe.name: Spatchcock barbecue chicken
recipe.info: An ultra-tasty addition to your barbecue meal

recipe.name: Italian-style roast cabbage wedges with tomato lentils
recipe.info: Roast cabbage for a veggie centrepiece, with crisp, caramelised leaves on the outside and a soft, sweet centre. Serve with our Italian-inspired lentils and golden roast new potatoes

recipe.name: The great breakfast burger
recipe.info: Start the day with this flavour-packed breakfast sausage burger with bacon, cheese and tomato relish

recipe.name: Leek, ricotta & gruyère tart
recipe.info: Ricotta gives this quiche a lovely, light cheese-cakey texture – leftovers make a great packed lunch

recipe.name: Spinach roulade with sundried tomatoes
recipe.info: A stunning centrepiece that is simple to make and sure to tempt vegetarians and meat eaters alike

recipe.name: Greek feta traybake
recipe.info: Make this Greek-inspired traybake with feta, olives, pitta bread and tomatoes for an easy midweek meal, then use the leftovers for lunch the next day

recipe.name: Sparkling mint & lemon juleps
recipe.info: A sparkling wine cocktail to start a lovely evening

recipe.name: Christmas dinner wellington
recipe.info: Mix up your festive main with this fabulous Christmas dinner wellington. A make-ahead meal in one, it incorporates stuffing and cranberry sauce, so all you need to think about on the big day is the veg and gravy

recipe.name: Spinach & smoked salmon egg muffins
recipe.info: Serve one or two of these per person for brunch - depending on how hungry/greedy you are

recipe.name: Minty beaujolais ice
recipe.info: This fruity granita is a perfect palate-cleansing starter

recipe.name: Healthy egg & chips
recipe.info: One that dads will love! This any-time meal is perfect with a helping of baked beans

recipe.name: Ultimate quiche Lorraine
recipe.info: The key to making the perfect quiche is simplicity, as you can see with this delicious recipe

recipe.name: One-pan piri piri chicken dinner
recipe.info: Try this one-pan piri piri chicken for a family dinner and adjust the chilli levels to suit your family's tolerance. You can use a whole chicken instead, if you like

recipe.name: Raspberry, lemon & frangipane tart
recipe.info: The most stunning summer dessert ever; raspberry, lemon and frangipane tart

recipe.name: Quinoa salad with grilled halloumi
recipe.info: Try this easy veggie salad for a great source of iron and enjoy as a light lunch or supper. It uses gluten-free quinoa for an extra dose of protein

recipe.name: Fruit & nut bowl
recipe.info: Top cheap and healthy porridge oats with chopped fresh oranges, Greek yogurt and a sprinkling of dried fruit, nuts and seeds

recipe.name: White chocolate & apricot cheesecake
recipe.info: A stunning centrepiece for any celebration or the perfect end to a Sunday lunch

recipe.name: Venison steaks with stroganoff sauce & shoestring fries
recipe.info: Steak and chips gets even more special with rare seared game and homemade fries with mushroom cream sauce

recipe.name: Strawberry & elderflower trifle
recipe.info: The plumpest, ripest strawberries make up this classic summer trifle with ginger jelly and a lemon drizzle cake base

recipe.name: Parsnip, mushroom & barley wreath
recipe.info: The perfect vegetarian Christmas or Sunday lunch centrepiece - a low-calorie nut loaf packed with grains, root vegetables, mixed mushrooms, herbs and spice

recipe.name: Raspberry, chocolate & hazelnut bread
recipe.info: This indulgent brunch loaf requires good bread and kneading skills- prepare the dough ahead then pop it in the oven to serve warm

recipe.name: Prosciutto-wrapped chicken & leek terrine
recipe.info: Gordon's make-ahead terrine is the perfect starter when you're entertaining a crowd

recipe.name: Peanut butter chicken
recipe.info: You'll love this new, budget chicken dish. Any leftovers freeze well and make a handy lunch.

recipe.name: Fish pie with saffron mash
recipe.info: A great dinner party dish. This can be made ahead and frozen so there's always something ready to entertain guests

recipe.name: Cauliflower rarebits
recipe.info: Combine cauliflower cheese with a traditional Welsh rarebit for the perfect pub lunch. Serve with chutney, watercress salad and a pint of beer

recipe.name: Slow cooked leg of lamb
recipe.info: Slow cooked, melt-in-the-mouth meat that needs seven hours in the oven but little more than seven minutes work from the cook

recipe.name: Pan-fried chicken in mushroom sauce
recipe.info: Creamy chicken and mushroom dish - a fabulous French seasonal recipe

recipe.name: Feta & kale loaded sweet potato
recipe.info: Serve up this sweet potato packed with feta, chickpeas and kale for a healthy lunch. Topped with pumpkin seeds, it delivers three of your 5-a-day

recipe.name: Mushroom & spinach risotto
recipe.info: Make the time to stir carefully during cooking to make this vegetarian Italian rice pot super creamy

recipe.name: Cinnamon twists
recipe.info: Bake these fabulous cinnamon twists for an on-the-go breakfast or sweet treat. They take a little effort but are well worth it

recipe.name: Buttermilk fried chicken
recipe.info: Follow this step-by-step recipe for foolproof fried chicken - dip in buttermilk batter for a golden, seasoned crust and sweet, tender chicken

recipe.name: Greek lamb with orzo
recipe.info: Entertaining doesn't have to equal stress, this spruced up one-pot is perfect for people with little time for preparation

recipe.name: Ultimate meringue
recipe.info: Learn how to make basic meringues and perfect your whisking skills. These light, crispy baked meringues are the perfect blank canvas for different flavours.

recipe.name: Gyoza
recipe.info: Learn to make these authentic Japanese meat or vegetable dumplings, known as yaki gyoza, with our step-by-step guide

recipe.name: Moussaka
recipe.info: Make our easy moussaka for an instant crowd pleaser. This classic Greek dish of layered thinly sliced potato, aubergine and lamb is topped with a creamy béchamel sauce.

recipe.name: Baked fruity autumn pudding
recipe.info: This pudding is bursting with autumn flavours, and can be made up to a day ahead - just reheat in the microwave

recipe.name: Turkish one-pan eggs & peppers (Menemen)
recipe.info: Menemen is a traditional Turkish dish that's healthy and brilliant for brunch, lunch or supper. Serve with warm pitta bread for scooping up the delicious sauce and runny egg yolks

recipe.name: Eggs benedict with smoked salmon & chives
recipe.info: Get your poaching technique honed and serve up this brunch classic – it's easily-doubled to feed a family or crowd

recipe.name: Moroccan-style barbecued leg of lamb
recipe.info: Mary Cadogan demonstrates the technique of boning out a leg of lamb and how to cook it

recipe.name: Quick tomato soup with cheesy garlic dippers
recipe.info: Everyone needs a trusty tomato soup recipe - and this one costs less than a pound per serving

recipe.name: Danish pastries
recipe.info: Turn the kitchen into your own little patisserie with this step-by-step guide to buttery Danish pastries

recipe.name: Creamy courgette lasagne
recipe.info: Serve this quick, creamy courgette & ricotta lasagne for a last-minute dinner party to impress vegetarian friends. It's a great way to use courgettes when they're in season

recipe.name: Sticky citrus sponge cake
recipe.info: A great dessert to feed a crowd at the end of a Sunday lunch - it's like a baked version of a steamed syrup sponge

recipe.name: Crumpets
recipe.info: Make your own fluffy crumpets for breakfast or brunch. They're well worth the effort and go down a treat with a slathering of butter

recipe.name: Herby Persian frittata
recipe.info: Power up your lunchbreak with this healthy frittata made with eggs, herbs, spring onions, walnuts and feta. It'll be on the table in just 20 minute

recipe.name: One-pan roast dinner
recipe.info: Take the stress out of a Sunday roast with this one-pan recipe that couldn't be simpler

recipe.name: The perfect croque monsieur
recipe.info: Master the croque monsieur with soft sourdough, gruyère, smoked ham and creamy mustard mayo. You'll relish every mouthful of this brunch classic.

recipe.name: Smoked mackerel, courgette & butter bean salad
recipe.info: Get a dose of omega-3 in this gluten-free salad that takes just 15 minutes to prepare. It's ideal for a quick and easy midweek supper, or a filling lunch

recipe.name: Flambéed chicken with asparagus
recipe.info: An elegant spring dinner party dish that looks and tastes very special. Perfect with new potatoes

recipe.name: pancake platter
recipe.info: Serve a base of wholemeal American-style pancakes alongside a range of toppings. Go sweet with fruit and yogurt, or savoury with soft cheese and salmon
